relation: keep in mind that as I drew this, I had still not yet played Mother 3. As a result, it may be more akin to a fusion of new Flint and EB64 Flint. Well, maybe.
A Territorial Oak, in the early stages of blowing up.
An interpretation of Buzz Buzz with the red swirl of Giygas. This was more or less an experiment in different textured brush types.

Pokey fleeing Fourside's Monotoli building in the helicopter. This one started to take form pretty randomly, but I like how it turned out a lot -- subtle and simple, you proabbly have to know what you're looking at in order to figure out what you're looking at... if that makes any sense.
